title: Noam Chomsky: The THREAT of AI
description:
Welcome to a gripping episode of Eye on AI, where hosts Craig Smith and Noam Chomsky dive deep into the pressing topic of "The THREAT of AI." Join us as we explore the fascinating insights of renowned scholar and linguist Noam Chomsky, who brings his unparalleled expertise to the table.

In this thought-provoking discussion, Chomsky sheds light on the potential dangers that artificial intelligence poses to our society. With his extensive background in cognitive science and linguistics, he provides a unique perspective on the ethical, social, and political implications of AI advancements.

From the risks of unchecked AI development to the potential loss of jobs and human autonomy, Chomsky delves into the multifaceted issues surrounding AI's rapid evolution. Prepare to be captivated as he explores the balance between the benefits and risks associated with this transformative technology.

Hosted by AI enthusiast Craig Smith and featuring the invaluable insights of Noam Chomsky, this Eye on AI episode is a must-listen for anyone intrigued by the future of AI, the impact on society, and the perspectives of one of the most influential intellectuals of our time.

Tags: Noam Chomsky, AI, artificial intelligence, threat of AI, cognitive science, linguistics, ethical implications, social implications, political implications, job loss, human autonomy, AI advancements, Craig Smith, Eye on AI, LLMs.
